comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: The former Aimée Crocker, wife of Alexander Miskinoff. She was divorced from A. Miskinoff in 1916 and married Prince Mstislav Galitzine in 1925. "Aimée Crocker (December 5, 1864 – February 7, 1941) was an American heiress, princess, Bohemian, world traveler, mystic and author best known for her adventures in the Far East, for her extravagant parties in San Francisco, New York and Paris and for her collections of husbands and lovers, adopted children, Buddhas, pearls, tattoos and snakes." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aim%C3%A9e_Crocker The other woman is her adopted daughter Yvonne Gouraud
